message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm asking for $130 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay $110 for it. I hope this works for you!
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I'm willing to come down to $120.  That's a fair price considering the value to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $115 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
